00001 #ifndef FIND_MODULE_H
00002 #define FIND_MODULE_H
00003 
00004 #include <omnetpp.h>
00005 
00012 template<typename T = cModule*>
00013 class FindModule
00014 {
00015   public:
00016     static T findSubModule(cModule *top)
00017     {
00018       T ret;
00019       for (cModule::SubmoduleIterator i(top); !i.end(); i++)
00020       {
00021         cModule *sub = i();
00022         ret = dynamic_cast<T>(sub);
00023         if (ret!=NULL)
00024           return ret;
00025         ret = findSubModule(sub);
00026         if (ret!=NULL)
00027           return ret;
00028       }
00029       return NULL;
00030     }
00031 
00032     static T findGlobalModule() {return findSubModule(simulation.getSystemModule());}
00033 
00034     static cModule* findHost(cModule *m) {
00035        cModule *parent = m->getParentModule();
00036       cModule *node = m;
00037 
00038       // all nodes should be a sub module of the simulation which has no parent module!!!
00039       while( parent->getParentModule() != NULL ){
00040       node = parent;
00041       parent = node->getParentModule();
00042       }
00043 
00044       return node;
00045     }
00046 };

00056 template<typename T>
00057 class ModuleAccess
00058 {
00059      // Note: MSVC 6.0 doesn't like const char *N as template parameter,
00060      // so we have to pass it via the ctor...
00061   private:
00062     T *p;
00063   public:
00064     ModuleAccess():
00065     p(0)
00066   {}
00067 
00068     T *get()
00069     {
00070         if (!p)
00071         {
00072             p = FindModule<T*>::findGlobalModule();
00073             if (!p) opp_error("Module %s not found",opp_typename(typeid(T)));
00074         }
00075         return p;
00076     }
00077 };
